title: I Knew Better, but I Bought Tesla Stock
sub_head: A bull market can tempt a business journalist into mistaking himself for an investing genius.
body:
The long-running bull market is a wondrous and marvelous thing. In the first quarter of 2021, Fidelity had 365,000 401(k) accounts with over $1 million, double the total from the first quarter of 2020.
The higher the markets rise, the more some of us believe we are investing geniuses. I fit this diagnosis. Though I spent my career covering business news and talking about stocks on cable news, I invested almost entirely in index funds and ETFsâ€”until a few months ago.
